channel.title: CVE Feed for XBMC Foundation -- Kodi (XBMC)

item.title: CVE-2017-8314|2024-08-05T16:34:22.480Z -- xbmc%20foundation -- kodi%20%28xbmc%29
item.description: Directory Traversal in Zip Extraction built-in function in Kodi 17.1 and earlier allows arbitrary file write on disk via a Zip file as subtitles.
